message: I propose we split the money 90/10, with me taking the larger share. It's a fair starting point, considering we both have to survive the inflation.
Alice, my turn. Let's be realistic, I'm proposing an 80/20 split in my favor.  Inflation hurts you more than me, so take the deal while it's still good!
Bob, inflation is hitting us both hard. I'm willing to compromise, but 80/20 is still too uneven. Let's split it 60/40, a fairer split in this situation.
Alice, time is running out! I'll agree to a 65/35 split,  acknowledging that you need a decent share to be on board. Take it before inflation eats away at this offer too!

Bob, we're both losing more and more with each round.  It's clear neither of us is going to get what we originally wanted. Let's cut our losses and split the money 50/50.  It's the only way we both get something out of this.
